remarks: The join of 3 atoms is not a lattice volume.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Jul-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
3atnelvol.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
3atnelvol.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
3atnelvol.v $e |- V = ( LVols ` K ) $.
3atnelvolN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) ) -> -. ( ( P .\/ Q ) .\/ R ) e. V ) $.
